class.name: CubeMap
class.description: A 6-sided 3D texture typically used for faking reflections. It can be used to make an object look as if it's reflecting its surroundings. This usually delivers much better performance than other reflection methods.

method.name: get_side
method.description: Returns an [Image] for a side of the [CubeMap] using one of the [enum Side] constants.

method.name: set_side
method.description: Sets an [Image] for a side of the [CubeMap] using one of the [enum Side] constants.
